channel.title: Dialogue above heads
channel.description: Does anyone know how to change what people say above their heads, like the genies in allstarscape?

item.title: Dialogue above heads
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

If you’re wondering where it’s located for the npcs, it’s in npcHander.java. If you want it for a player, it would be this: plrText = "Text"; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true;

If that one doesn’t work, then this one will: txt4 = "Text"; string4UpdateRequired = true;

Read full topic
